$comment:
/*
IDS â€” Player Config Schema (v0.2)

PURPOSE
  This schema defines the single source of truth for what the IDS Player accepts
  as a configuration. Admin (producer) must generate JSON that validates here.

DECISIONS (LOCKED)
  - Multiple campaigns are allowed; player resolves priority at runtime.
  - Ordering is explicit via `order` (NOT array position).
  - Duration is strict: durationSec >= 1 (0 is forbidden).
  - Strict schema: additionalProperties is false (no silent/unknown fields).
  - Comments are allowed via a `$comment` string field.

SEMANTICS OVERVIEW
  A config = a list of campaigns. Each campaign contains an ordered list of items.
  The Player renders items in ascending `order` inside a campaign.
  Campaigns are selected by priority at runtime.

EVOLUTION RULES
  Any change here must:
    1) Update examples in shared/contract/examples/
    2) Keep `make validate` passing
    3) Be paired with player/admin changes if semantics change
*/
title: IDS Player Config

$comment.$comment:
/*
Optional human-facing explanation. Useful inside examples.
Ignored by the player logic.
*/

campaignId.$comment:
/*
Stable identifier for this campaign.
Should be unique across campaigns.
*/

campaignPriority.$comment:
/*
Priority used by the scheduler (higher = more important).
Does not define playlist order inside a campaign.
*/

generatedAt.$comment:
/*
When this campaign was generated.
Used for debugging reproducibility and freshness.
*/

items.$comment:
/*
Playlist items. The Player must render items in ascending `order`.
Array index is not semantic; `order` is.
*/

contentId.$comment:
/*
Stable identifier for this item.
Useful for logs, debugging, and future analytics.
*/

type.$comment:
/*
Item type semantics:
  - TEXT: `data` is the literal text content to display.
  - IMAGE: `data` is a path or URL pointing to an image.
  - VIDEO: `data` is a path or URL pointing to a video.

Note: This schema allows both paths and URLs as strings.
Runtime resolution rules belong to the Player.
*/

data.$comment:
/*
Payload associated with the item.
Meaning depends on `type`.
*/

durationSec.$comment:
/*
How long to display this item (in seconds).
Decision locked: durationSec must be >= 1.
*/

order.$comment:
/*
Explicit playlist order. The Player sorts items by ascending `order`.
Decision locked: ordering is NOT by array position.
*/
